text: oru nirnita kalaparidhi vare avaril ninnum nam siksa merrivccal avar parayuka tanne ceyyum; atine tatannu nirttunna karyamentan ennâ€Œ. srad'dhikkuka. atavarkk vannettunna divasam atavaril ninn tiriccukalayappetunnatalla. enteanninepparri avar parihasiccirunnuvea atavaril vannettukayum ceyyum
